title: 820-00138 No backlight
message:
I get image folder on screen but no backlight
U7701: 9-10 12.58v, 17 3.3v, 19 0v, 21 0v, 8 5v

title: 820-00138 No backlight
message:
You forgot pins 5, 18, 11.
Low level on pin 11 (if is the case) should generate some voltage at PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT.
Do you get something there?

title: 820-00138 No backlight
message:
[LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]C7718[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT] was 0v and it was shorted, but the short is coming from the LCD connector, ordered some already. 

Thanks for the help amigos!
